TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContainerVisual extends System.Windows.Media.Visual

summary.span: 管理 对象的集合。

span.span: Manages a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作一系列的容器对象。The class is used as a container for a collection of objects. 类派生自类，以便类还可以包含视觉对象的集合。The class derives from the class, such that the class can also contain a collection of visual objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建用作两个父对象对象。The following example shows how to create a object that is used as the parent for two objects. 添加到的对象对象必须添加反向的 z 顺序 （从下到上），以确保它们呈现在正确的绘制顺序。Objects that are added to the object must be added in reverse z-order (bottom to top) to ensure they are rendering in the correct drawing order. 为了使可视化树，以正确枚举，该示例提供的重写的实现方法和属性。In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the method and property. [!code-csharp[ContainerVisualHost#ContainerVisualHost01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContainerVisualHost/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#containervisualhost01)] [!code-vb[ContainerVisualHost#ContainerVisualHost01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContainerVisualHost/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#containervisualhost01)]

param.name: filterCallback
param.span: 允许在处理命中测试结果时忽略无关的可视化树部分的委托。

span.span: The delegate that allows you to ignore parts of the visual tree that you are not interested in processing in your hit test results.

param.name: resultCallback
param.span: 用于控制返回命中测试信息的委托。

span.span: The delegate that is used to control the return of hit test information.

param.name: hitTestParameters
param.span: 定义命中测试的参数集。

span.span: Defines the set of parameters for a hit test.

summary.span: 使用 和 对象启动 上的命中测试。

span.span: Initiates a hit test on the by using the and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `filterCallback`参数可以为 null，在这种情况下，它将被忽略。The `filterCallback` parameter can be null, in which case, it is ignored. 如果`filterCallback`不是`null`之前, 调用`resultCallback`。If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的不透明度（基于 0=透明，1=不透明）。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of the , based on 0=transparent, 1=opaque.

value.span: 一个介于 0 到 1 之间的值，它指定从完全透明到完全不透明之间的一个范围。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies a range from fully transparent to fully opaque.

value.span: 如果值为 0，则指示 完全透明；如果值为 1，则指示 完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the is completely opaque.

value.span: 值 0.5 指示不透明度为 50%，值 0.725 指示不透明度为 72.5%，依此类推。

span.span: A value 0.5 indicates 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ XSnappingGuidelines { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };
member this.XSnappingGuidelines : System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection with get, set

summary.span: 为 获取或设置 X（水平）准线。

span.span: Gets or sets the X (horizontal) guideline for the .
The horizontal guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用像素对齐功能是，以便对象边缘呈现在特定于设备的像素为单位，内容布局固定的过程。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 图形系统使用与设备无关的单元来使分辨率和设备独立。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素都会随着系统的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置自动进行缩放。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 这为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序提供了不同 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序自动感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能由于抗锯齿不规则的边缘呈现出。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间时，可能发生的这些项目，通常可看做模糊，或"软"边缘。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解决此问题，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]消除生成的抗锯齿的柔化边缘的可视化树与设备像素为单位通过启用像素对齐功能，"对齐"中的对象边缘提供一种方法。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ YSnappingGuidelines { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };
member this.YSnappingGuidelines : System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection with get, set

summary.span: 为 获取或设置 Y（垂直）准线。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y (vertical) guideline for the .
The vertical guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用像素对齐功能是，以便对象边缘呈现在特定于设备的像素为单位，内容布局固定的过程。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 图形系统使用与设备无关的单元来使分辨率和设备独立。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素都会随着系统的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置自动进行缩放。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 这为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序提供了不同 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序自动感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 但是，这[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]独立性可能由于抗锯齿不规则的边缘呈现出。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 边缘的位置位于中间设备像素，而不是设备像素之间时，可能发生的这些项目，通常可看做模糊，或"软"边缘。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解决此问题，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]消除生成的抗锯齿的柔化边缘的可视化树与设备像素为单位通过启用像素对齐功能，"对齐"中的对象边缘提供一种方法。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
